Shisui plants a closed [[Fūma Shuriken]] into the ground, connected to him by a string. When he pulls on it, the shuriken flies back to him while spinning, fanned out and hitting any opponents on the way back.

== Trivia ==
* {{translation|'''Oboroguruma'''|朧車||lit meaning=hazy cart}} is a [[wikipedia:Oboroguruma|Yōkai in Japanese mythology]] - a ghostly oxcart with a face on it.

[[Clan::Uchiha clan| ]]
